item.title: Julian Assange: Wikileaks founder rejects deal allowing him to leave Ecuador embassy in London after six years - The Independent

Julian Assange: Wikileaks founder rejects deal allowing him to leave Ecuador embassy in London after six years  The Independent

item.title: Julian Assange reportedly gave away his cat so it wouldn't be trapped in the Ecuadorian Embassy with him anymore - Business Insider
item.description:
Julian Assange reportedly gave away his cat so it wouldn't be trapped in the Ecuadorian Embassy with him anymore  Business Insider

Assange freed the cat as its "isolation became unbearable," Italian media reported. The WikiLeaks founder has been holed up there since 2012.

item.title: Travel - The ancient leather tanners of Ecuador - BBC News
